rules.title: Respect All Members
rules.description: Treat everyone with kindness and respect. No discrimination based on race, gender, religion, or background.

rules.title: No Harassment or Bullying
rules.description: Harassment, bullying, or any form of targeted abuse is strictly prohibited.

rules.title: No Toxic Behavior
rules.description: Avoid toxic behavior, excessive complaining, or creating negative atmosphere.

rules.title: Appropriate Language
rules.description: Keep language family-friendly. No excessive swearing, offensive slurs, or inappropriate content.

rules.title: No Spam or Flooding
rules.description: Don't spam messages, emojis, or flood channels with repetitive content.

rules.title: Voice Channel Etiquette
rules.description: Be mindful of others in voice channels. Don't scream, play loud music, or create excessive noise.

rules.title: No Cheating or Hacking
rules.description: Cheating, hacking, or using unfair advantages in games is not allowed.

rules.title: Good Sportsmanship
rules.description: Maintain good sportsmanship in games. No rage quitting, trash talking, or unsportsmanlike conduct.

rules.title: Follow Tournament Rules
rules.description: When participating in tournaments, follow all specific rules and guidelines provided.

rules.title: Active Event Participation
rules.description: When joining events, be an active participant. Don't join just to spectate without permission.

rules.title: Respect Event Hosts
rules.description: Listen to event hosts and moderators. Follow their instructions during events.

rules.title: No NSFW Content
rules.description: No adult content, explicit images, or inappropriate material of any kind.

rules.title: Use Channels for Purpose
rules.description: Post content in appropriate channels. Don't post gaming content in general chat, etc.

rules.title: No Unauthorized Advertising
rules.description: Don't advertise other servers, products, or services without permission.

rules.title: Respect Moderators
rules.description: Respect moderator decisions. If you disagree, discuss it privately, not in public channels.

rules.title: Appeal Process
rules.description: If you believe a moderation action was unfair, contact moderators privately to discuss.

settings.contactModerators: DM any moderator for questions or appeals
settings.ruleChanges: Rules may be updated as the community grows
